channel.title: I Officially Hate M$
channel.description:
[quote="Microdick"]Dear JAMES11 QIAN,
Your Live Search Club order has shipped!
Order Number: 27473**** Ship Date: 2007-09-19 Shipping Address: *******, MONTVILLE, NJ 07045
Tracking Number: Tracking number is not available for this shipment
Qty Product Name 1 5 Song Downloads
You can expect to receive your order in 3-7 business days.
If you have any comments or questions please email us at LiveSearchClub@incentivelogic.com.
Thank you for your order. We look forward to your ongoing participation in the Live Search Club!
Sincerely, Live Search Club Order Support LiveSearchClub@incentivelogic.com http://club.live.com/
Incentive Logic is shipping your order on behalf of Microsoft
Microsoft respects your privacy. To learn more, please read our online Privacy Statement. http://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/default.aspx Microsoft Corporation, One Microsoft Way, Redmond, WA 98052[/quote]
Of the 20 email accounts I created and 20 Zune/Vistas I ordered, they only send me these 5 free song downloads which are probably DRM-protected. Fucking Microsoft.

item.title: I Officially Hate M$
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:47, topic:144868”]If you all read the Terms of Service before playing the game. They can at anytime remove tickets, not reward you, or modify your reward. They are even allowed to modify the TOS whenever they’d like. That’s how they were able to remove some of the prizes and replace them with others, like when they got rid of Vista Ultimate.

I can’t really say it’s morally right, because it isn’t. But they can get away with it, that’s why MicroSoft sucks.[/quote]yah has anyone gotten real prizes from it?

Read full topic

item.title: I Officially Hate M$
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

If you all read the Terms of Service before playing the game. They can at anytime remove tickets, not reward you, or modify your reward. They are even allowed to modify the TOS whenever they’d like. That’s how they were able to remove some of the prizes and replace them with others, like when they got rid of Vista Ultimate.

I can’t really say it’s morally right, because it isn’t. But they can get away with it, that’s why MicroSoft sucks.

Read full topic

They’re not about to get sued because they made a bullshit promise, they can more than afford 10zunes and 10 vistas to keep away the one lawyers son, who decides he wants to get angry at microsoft.[/quote]
which is why they put stuff in there terms and And contraracts. He probably violated them
